job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Detailed JD:
•            Participate in architecture reviews.
•            Participate in operations reviews.
•            Identify and automate measurement of operations KPIs.
•            DevOps rollout and implementation
•            Automated the deployment of production ready technical solutions.
•            Writing automation that can be easily supported and extended by others.
•            Take full responsibility for the availability and performance of the platform.
•            3+ years of software development experience
•            Expert at problem solving, algorithms, and data structures.
•            Passionate about investigating, employing, and managing 3rd party and open source solutions when building a cloud native platform.
•            Experience operating solutions based on a microservice architecture
•            Experience in integrating and automating solutions to provide a highly scalable, high throughput platform.
Experience working with mature development practices and tools for source control, security, and deployment.
